alert.note: Alert for Delaware; Eastern Chester; Eastern Montgomery; Lower Bucks; Philadelphia; Western Chester (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 19 at 6:59PM EST until January 19 at 10:00PM EST by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch. * WHERE...Portions of northern Delaware, southern New Jersey and southeast Pennsylvania. * WHEN...Until 10 PM EST this evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Temperatures will rapidly drop into the teens late tonight. Any untreated roads will become icy and dangerous. Areas of blowing snow are possible over the weekend.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Delaware; Eastern Chester; Eastern Montgomery; Lower Bucks; Philadelphia; Western Chester
